System -> Administration -> Date and Time
via terminal
man date
i'm not in kde nor gnome
sudo /etc/init.d/ntpdate restart
date is a command line tool.. man will show you how to use it.. ie. man date
ntpdate does it over the network to a time server as BioVorE notes
